underlying_goal: Build a new API endpoint for user authentication with JWT tokens and add comprehensive test coverage.
friction_detail: Initial JWT library import was incorrect, requiring one round of debugging before the correct import was identified.
brief_summary: User asked Claude to implement JWT-based authentication for their Express API. Claude built the auth middleware, login/register endpoints, and comprehensive test suite. One minor friction event with library imports, but overall smooth implementation completed in a single session.
